title: Show 169 - Ruth Smeeth
itunes:title: Show 169 - Ruth Smeeth
itunes:subtitle: The importance of free speech - and the limits ofâ€¦
description:
The importance of free speech - and the limits of it - have again been the subject of contentious debate. Ruth Smeeth is the new Chief Executive of the Index on Censorship, an organisation which champions freedom of expression. Her timely appointment follows her 4 years as the Labour MP for Stoke-on-Trent North. Ruth reflects on her experience as a Jewish woman in Jeremy Corbyn's Labour Party and delivers her analysis on how Labour can win places like Stoke back. Follow Ruth on Twitter here: @RuthSmeeth Follow Index on Censorship here: @IndexCensorship Sign up to the Index on Censorship mailing list here: https://www.indexoncensorship.org/ Donate to Black Lives Matter here: https://secure.actblue.com/donate/ms_blm_homepage_2019 Follow Matt on Twitter: @mattforde For the latest UK Government advice on coronavirus go to: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus *** IMPORTANT TOUR UPDATE *** NEW REARRANGED DATES INCLUDE: 2 October - Corby Cube 4 October - Brighton Komedia 9 October - Chorley Little Theatre 18 October - Leeds Hyde Park Book Club 25 October - Newcastle Stand 3 November - Camberley Theatre 13 November - Alnwick Playhouse 15 November - York Crescent 19 November - Cardiff Sherman Theatre 29 November - Glasgow Stand 3 December - Southend Dixon Studio 6 December - Sheffield Leadmill

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
